abstract: New York Assemblyman Michael Blake's announcement that he will become partner at political consulting firm Hilltop Public Solutions prompts dismay from reform advocates who supported Blake's election based on his anti-corruption position; Blake received approval for job from Legislative Ethics Commission and says it presents no conflict of interest.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Michael Blake’s new partnership with Hilltop Public Solutions, a national political firm, is a disappointment to some reform advocates.

headline.main: Assemblyman Who Urged Reform Takes Job With Consulting Firm
headline.print_headline: Assemblyman Who Urged Reform in Capital Adds a Consulting Job, Prompting Dismay

snippet: Assemblyman Michael Blake’s new partnership with Hilltop Public Solutions, a national political firm, is a disappointment to some reform advocates.
